LoadingTextID.SourceString:
This is the first battle of the street racer
who would later be called a legend—
One that never made it into the records...
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
This is the first battle of the street racer
who would later be called a legend—
One that never made it into the records...

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
A man with a dangerous aura, Wataru Akiyama.
Meeting him will change fate!
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
A man with a dangerous aura, Wataru Akiyama.
Meeting him will change fate!

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Wataru Akiyama flags down a street racer
 he happens to meet by chance. Surprised by the racer's
technique, Wataru makes a proposal.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Wataru Akiyama flags down a street racer
 he happens to meet by chance. Surprised by the racer's
technique, Wataru makes a proposal.

NarrationTextID.SourceString: After parting with Wataru, a new encounter waited just ahead...
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString: After parting with Wataru, a new encounter waited just ahead...

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Koichiro Iketani is driving down Akina Pass.
He happens to run into the street racer who
blew past him the other day.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Koichiro Iketani is driving down Akina Pass.
He happens to run into the street racer who
blew past him the other day.

NarrationTextID.SourceString: After getting blown away again, a smile on appears on Iketani's face?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString: After getting blown away again, a smile on appears on Iketani's face?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
With his teammates in tow, Iketani
goes after a lone street racer.
The goal is to recruit him to the team.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
With his teammates in tow, Iketani
goes after a lone street racer.
The goal is to recruit him to the team.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
A mystery crew challenges the SpeedStars to a friendly match.
Who are they really?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
A mystery crew challenges the SpeedStars to a friendly match.
Who are they really?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A mysterious street-racing team shows st Mt. Akina.
Bored of scouting, the members were looking for
someone to kill time with.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A mysterious street-racing team shows st Mt. Akina.
Bored of scouting, the members were looking for
someone to kill time with.

NarrationTextID.SourceString: On the way back after leaving Kenta in the dust, a man was waiting up ahead…
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString: On the way back after leaving Kenta in the dust, a man was waiting up ahead…

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
On the way back from scouting Akina, Ryosuke
revises the coming project plan.
A lone street racer shows up.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
On the way back from scouting Akina, Ryosuke
revises the coming project plan.
A lone street racer shows up.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The friendly match on Akina.
There, a young man in an AE86 appears.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The friendly match on Akina.
There, a young man in an AE86 appears.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Mt. Akina is buzzing over the mysterious
young man who defeated the Akagi Red Suns.
It seems Iketani wants to recruit him to the team.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Mt. Akina is buzzing over the mysterious
young man who defeated the Akagi Red Suns.
It seems Iketani wants to recruit him to the team.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The hype won't die down.
Who on earth is the AE86 from Akina?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The hype won't die down.
Who on earth is the AE86 from Akina?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A white & black AE86 appeared on sunny
Mt. Akina. He seems to be headed somewhere.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A white & black AE86 appeared on sunny
Mt. Akina. He seems to be headed somewhere.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
A challenge hits the table.
Name on it: Myogi NightKids' Takeshi Nakazato.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
A challenge hits the table.
Name on it: Myogi NightKids' Takeshi Nakazato.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A challenge letter showed up out of nowhere.
It was from a street racer on Mt. Myogi.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A challenge letter showed up out of nowhere.
It was from a street racer on Mt. Myogi.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
A message arrives from the Myogi NightKids.
It's an invitation to a dangerous night.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
A message arrives from the Myogi NightKids.
It's an invitation to a dangerous night.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Shingo Shoji of the NightKids sent word about the battle.
Night on Mt. Myogi reeks of danger.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Shingo Shoji of the NightKids sent word about the battle.
Night on Mt. Myogi reeks of danger.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Quick cooldown at Usui.
The hometown fastest duo is already posted.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Quick cooldown at Usui.
The hometown fastest duo is already posted.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Visibility is poor on the Usui pass road.
Appearing there are racers who call this place home.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Visibility is poor on the Usui pass road.
Appearing there are racers who call this place home.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
In the dark of night,
the two fastest of Usui, Impact Blue, stand in the way…
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
In the dark of night,
the two fastest of Usui, Impact Blue, stand in the way…

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A duo climbs out of a blue SilEighty.
Claiming to be Usui's fastest, the girls challenge again.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A duo climbs out of a blue SilEighty.
Claiming to be Usui's fastest, the girls challenge again.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Chasing the White Comet to Akagi.
Who's the man waiting at the summit?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Chasing the White Comet to Akagi.
Who's the man waiting at the summit?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Hunting the White Comet of Akagi,
they run into Kenta Nakamura—the Red Suns scout who checked Akina.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Hunting the White Comet of Akagi,
they run into Kenta Nakamura—the Red Suns scout who checked Akina.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
After Kenta's battle,
suddenly a yellow FD appeared, slicing through the dark.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
After Kenta's battle,
suddenly a yellow FD appeared, slicing through the dark.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A yellow FD appears on Akagi.
Its driver, Keisuke Takahashi, seems a bit irritated.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A yellow FD appears on Akagi.
Its driver, Keisuke Takahashi, seems a bit irritated.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Keisuke Takahashi drives off.
Coming the other way is a familiar face.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Keisuke Takahashi drives off.
Coming the other way is a familiar face.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Akagi grows quiet after the Red Suns leave.
Then a familiar turbo howl rings out.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Akagi grows quiet after the Red Suns leave.
Then a familiar turbo howl rings out.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Wataru demands a second battle.
From behind him, an ominous sound echoes.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Wataru demands a second battle.
From behind him, an ominous sound echoes.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
The second battle with Wataru begins.
Closing in from behind is another exhaust note.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
The second battle with Wataru begins.
Closing in from behind is another exhaust note.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Seiji Iwaki steps out of nowhere.
Another hunter looking for the Takahashis
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Seiji Iwaki steps out of nowhere.
Another hunter looking for the Takahashis

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Seiji Iwaki says he came to Akagi looking for the Takahashi brothers.
Failing his aim, he challenges a battle.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Seiji Iwaki says he came to Akagi looking for the Takahashi brothers.
Failing his aim, he challenges a battle.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Chased by Iketani and the crew after a long reunion,
what suddenly appeared was a mysterious car.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Chased by Iketani and the crew after a long reunion,
what suddenly appeared was a mysterious car.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Iketani and the others are running Akina.
The AE86's hot streak has them a little hyped.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Iketani and the others are running Akina.
The AE86's hot streak has them a little hyped.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Two NightKids they met by chance.
Apparently they're going to battle the Red Suns led by the White Comet.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Two NightKids they met by chance.
Apparently they're going to battle the Red Suns led by the White Comet.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
With a battle against the Red Suns ahead, Shoji and Nakazato speak.
They say something happened that rewrote the street power map.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
With a battle against the Red Suns ahead, Shoji and Nakazato speak.
They say something happened that rewrote the street power map.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Back to Mt. Akagi again.
There stood the man they'd been searching for.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Back to Mt. Akagi again.
There stood the man they'd been searching for.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
The Red Suns defeat the NightKids.
When they visit their stronghold on Akagi, a certain man is standing there.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
The Red Suns defeat the NightKids.
When they visit their stronghold on Akagi, a certain man is standing there.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
On Ryosuke's recommendation, they visit Irohazaka.
Waiting there was a tough street-racing army.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
On Ryosuke's recommendation, they visit Irohazaka.
Waiting there was a tough street-racing army.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Emperor, the street-racing team from Irohazaka—
among them stands the man who once fought at Akagi.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Emperor, the street-racing team from Irohazaka—
among them stands the man who once fought at Akagi.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Emperor's member loses, and Seiji Iwaki is dragged out.
A 1v1 battle raises its curtain.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Emperor's member loses, and Seiji Iwaki is dragged out.
A 1v1 battle raises its curtain.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
On the eve of a one-on-one battle, Seiji Iwaki grins fearlessly.
He seems absolutely confident.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
On the eve of a one-on-one battle, Seiji Iwaki grins fearlessly.
He seems absolutely confident.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
An unfamiliar car appears on Akina.
They say he came looking for the Akina AE86. Who is he?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
An unfamiliar car appears on Akina.
They say he came looking for the Akina AE86. Who is he?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
An unfamiliar car appears on Akina.
He too seems to be searching for the Akina AE86.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
An unfamiliar car appears on Akina.
He too seems to be searching for the Akina AE86.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The mysterious man, Kai Kogashiwa.
He was a beast raised on driving from childhood.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The mysterious man, Kai Kogashiwa.
He was a beast raised on driving from childhood.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Kai Kogashiwa challenged the Akina AE86 and lost.
He seems fired up for revenge.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Kai Kogashiwa challenged the Akina AE86 and lost.
He seems fired up for revenge.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Irohazaka still echoes with the afterglow of a fierce fight.
There appears Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Irohazaka still echoes with the afterglow of a fierce fight.
There appears Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo, appears suddenly.
He too seems captivated by the Akina AE86's speed.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo, appears suddenly.
He too seems captivated by the Akina AE86's speed.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
On the way to Akagi after being summoned by Ryosuke,
a rough guy picks a fight on snowy Akina.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
On the way to Akagi after being summoned by Ryosuke,
a rough guy picks a fight on snowy Akina.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Passing through Akina on the way to Ryosuke.
The one who tangles with them on the snowy touge is a rough character.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Passing through Akina on the way to Ryosuke.
The one who tangles with them on the snowy touge is a rough character.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
When they reached Akagi, Ryosuke wasn't there.
Instead, there was a shocking duo.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
When they reached Akagi, Ryosuke wasn't there.
Instead, there was a shocking duo.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
On Akagi without Ryosuke were Wataru Akiyama and Kenta Nakamura.
By Wataru's idea, they battle to kill time until Ryosuke arrives.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
On Akagi without Ryosuke were Wataru Akiyama and Kenta Nakamura.
By Wataru's idea, they battle to kill time until Ryosuke arrives.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Ryosuke appears after the battles with Kenta and Wataru.
What will the White Comet of Akagi say?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Ryosuke appears after the battles with Kenta and Wataru.
What will the White Comet of Akagi say?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Ryosuke Takahashi appears on Akagi.
It seems he has something to say.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Ryosuke Takahashi appears on Akagi.
It seems he has something to say.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
A request from Ryosuke Takahashi.
It was to fight two street racers.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
A request from Ryosuke Takahashi.
It was to fight two street racers.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
First matchup on Ryosuke's card:
The Red Suns' number 2, Keisuke Takahashi.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
First matchup on Ryosuke's card:
The Red Suns' number 2, Keisuke Takahashi.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
At last they meet the rumored street racer.
The driver, Takumi Fujiwara, held a firm resolve in his eyes.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
At last they meet the rumored street racer.
The driver, Takumi Fujiwara, held a firm resolve in his eyes.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
At last, the Akina AE86 appears.
Its driver, Takumi Fujiwara, seems to have made up his mind.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
At last, the Akina AE86 appears.
Its driver, Takumi Fujiwara, seems to have made up his mind.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The legend that started won't stop.
What is the new team Ryosuke Takahashi formed!?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The legend that started won't stop.
What is the new team Ryosuke Takahashi formed!?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Project D, the expedition team Ryosuke Takahashi launched.
Their blazing run had many street racers fired up.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Project D, the expedition team Ryosuke Takahashi launched.
Their blazing run had many street racers fired up.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Kyoichi, met again at the foot of Mt. Akagi.
With few words, he demands a battle.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Kyoichi, met again at the foot of Mt. Akagi.
With few words, he demands a battle.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo, appears on Akagi.
It seems there's something he wants to check.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo, appears on Akagi.
It seems there's something he wants to check.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Chasing Project D to Momiji Line.
Local heat turns the pass into an oven.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Chasing Project D to Momiji Line.
Local heat turns the pass into an oven.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Seven Star Leaf, the Momiji Line street-racing team.
They say they battled Project D the other day.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Seven Star Leaf, the Momiji Line street-racing team.
They say they battled Project D the other day.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Seven Star Leaf's hillclimb ace, Juro Kawai.
His 400-horse machine charges up Momiji Line.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Seven Star Leaf's hillclimb ace, Juro Kawai.
His 400-horse machine charges up Momiji Line.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Juro Kawai, Seven Star Leaf's hillclimb ace.
After losing to Project D, he's reexamining his driving.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Juro Kawai, Seven Star Leaf's hillclimb ace.
After losing to Project D, he's reexamining his driving.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Toru Suetsugu bowed out after Takumi beat him.
The fighting spirit sleeping inside him re-ignites.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Toru Suetsugu bowed out after Takumi beat him.
The fighting spirit sleeping inside him re-ignites.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Toru Suetsugu once retired from battling.
From his trembling hands, nerves and excitement can be felt.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Toru Suetsugu once retired from battling.
From his trembling hands, nerves and excitement can be felt.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
They visit Happogahara chasing Project D's shadow.
This pass is a magnet for speed freaks.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
They visit Happogahara chasing Project D's shadow.
This pass is a magnet for speed freaks.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
They visit Happogahara seeking the next opponent.
There stands Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
They visit Happogahara seeking the next opponent.
There stands Emperor's leader, Kyoichi Sudo.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Kyoichi breaks down the Happogahara playbook.
What ties him so hard to Todo School?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Kyoichi breaks down the Happogahara playbook.
What ties him so hard to Todo School?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Kyoichi Sudo talks about how to conquer Happogahara.
He was once a student of the Todo School.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Kyoichi Sudo talks about how to conquer Happogahara.
He was once a student of the Todo School.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Tomoyuki Tate, a Todo School alum and active pro racer.
On his suggestion, they join Todo's practice.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Tomoyuki Tate, a Todo School alum and active pro racer.
On his suggestion, they join Todo's practice.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Tomoyuki Tate, a Todo School alum and active pro racer.
On his advice, they join a student practice session.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Tomoyuki Tate, a Todo School alum and active pro racer.
On his advice, they join a student practice session.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Sakai, one half of Todo's current top two.
That creepy grin finally shows teeth.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Sakai, one half of Todo's current top two.
That creepy grin finally shows teeth.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Sakai, boasting top-tier skill even among Todo's powerhouses.
Wearing a sinister smile, he throws down a challenge.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Sakai, boasting top-tier skill even among Todo's powerhouses.
Wearing a sinister smile, he throws down a challenge.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Daiki Ninomiya, widely called Todo's ace.
What is the strength of his natural braking sense?
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Daiki Ninomiya, widely called Todo's ace.
What is the strength of his natural braking sense?

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Daiki Ninomiya, rated top three among Todo's alumni.
The aura around him speaks to his ability.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Daiki Ninomiya, rated top three among Todo's alumni.
The aura around him speaks to his ability.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Mt. Akina, visited for the first time in a while.
What appeared there was someone insanely fast...
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Mt. Akina, visited for the first time in a while.
What appeared there was someone insanely fast...

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Akina, visited after a long time, is wrapped in excitement.
The Akina SpeedStars seem proud of Project D's success.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Akina, visited after a long time, is wrapped in excitement.
The Akina SpeedStars seem proud of Project D's success.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Without learning the truth of the mystery Impreza,
next up is a rule-breaking alliance team.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Without learning the truth of the mystery Impreza,
next up is a rule-breaking alliance team.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
The Northwest Saitama Alliance waits at Sadamine Pass.
Behind their leader Nobuhiko Akiyama stands his cousin.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
The Northwest Saitama Alliance waits at Sadamine Pass.
Behind their leader Nobuhiko Akiyama stands his cousin.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Before the three, a black FD appears.
A powerfulful rotary note echoes through the pass.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Before the three, a black FD appears.
A powerfulful rotary note echoes through the pass.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
At Nobuhiko Akiyama's request, they battle a black FD.
Its driver, Kyoko Iwase, has eyes that look far away.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
At Nobuhiko Akiyama's request, they battle a black FD.
Its driver, Kyoko Iwase, has eyes that look far away.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Finally, Sakamoto the rally guy shows.
And the car? Didn't see that pick coming.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Finally, Sakamoto the rally guy shows.
And the car? Didn't see that pick coming.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Sakamoto, the Alliance's hidden card and a rallyist.
His Cappuccino is a monster machine whose weapon is lightness.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Sakamoto, the Alliance's hidden card and a rallyist.
His Cappuccino is a monster machine whose weapon is lightness.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Fired up by the fierce fight with Sakamoto — of course, that man!!
His evolved Levin tears up the pass.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Fired up by the fierce fight with Sakamoto — of course, that man!!
His evolved Levin tears up the pass.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
While the afterglow of the Sakamoto battle lingers,
Wataru rolls up with a fresh motor and a fight to pick.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
While the afterglow of the Sakamoto battle lingers,
Wataru rolls up with a fresh motor and a fight to pick.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
As Project D's Saitama expedition hits the final phase,
weird types show at Usui, Impact Blue's home turf.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
As Project D's Saitama expedition hits the final phase,
weird types show at Usui, Impact Blue's home turf.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Called by Impact Blue, they visit Usui.
There, a suspicious duo is present.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Called by Impact Blue, they visit Usui.
There, a suspicious duo is present.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The two men from Tokyo sneak off.
Passing them are the angels of Usui Pass.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The two men from Tokyo sneak off.
Passing them are the angels of Usui Pass.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Facing Impact Blue again after a long time.
There's a hint of sadness in their expressions.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Facing Impact Blue again after a long time.
There's a hint of sadness in their expressions.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
After the final battle with Impact Blue, they head straight for Dozaka Pass.
A bad feeling crosses the chest.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
After the final battle with Impact Blue, they head straight for Dozaka Pass.
A bad feeling crosses the chest.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
unning Dozaka Pass, an exhaust roar rings from behind.
It seems someone is giving chase.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
unning Dozaka Pass, an exhaust roar rings from behind.
It seems someone is giving chase.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Evo guys flag them down out of nowhere.
Seems they've had a rough time lately.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Evo guys flag them down out of nowhere.
Seems they've had a rough time lately.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Men who say they've had a rough time lately.
Riding Lancer Evos, they want a battle to blow it off.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Men who say they've had a rough time lately.
Riding Lancer Evos, they want a battle to blow it off.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The Evo crew clears out, and a rotary is heard.
Kyoko Iwase steps in — eyes still red.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The Evo crew clears out, and a rotary is heard.
Kyoko Iwase steps in — eyes still red.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Kyoko, whose love for Project D's Keisuke  failed.
She seems to have come to the place tied to their memories.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Kyoko, whose love for Project D's Keisuke  failed.
She seems to have come to the place tied to their memories.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Hearing the rumors about Project D, they came to Sadamine Pass.
Waiting there were men they never expected to see.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Hearing the rumors about Project D, they came to Sadamine Pass.
Waiting there were men they never expected to see.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
The Emperor-based street racers at Irohazaka.
Among them was the man who once fought on Akagi.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
The Emperor-based street racers at Irohazaka.
Among them was the man who once fought on Akagi.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Having driven off the impostor, they finally reached the spot.
It was the home course of the touge gods.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Having driven off the impostor, they finally reached the spot.
It was the home course of the touge gods.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Arriving at Mt. Tsukuba, a familiar exhaust note hit their ears.
Kenta Nakamura of the Red Suns was sneaking in some training runs.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Arriving at Mt. Tsukuba, a familiar exhaust note hit their ears.
Kenta Nakamura of the Red Suns was sneaking in some training runs.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
While waiting for Purple Shadow to show up,
the duo we once went head-to-head with appeared!
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
While waiting for Purple Shadow to show up,
the duo we once went head-to-head with appeared!

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Fresh off the Kenta run, two more roll up—Todo School`s Daiki and Sakai.
Word is they're here to call out the "God of the Touge."
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Fresh off the Kenta run, two more roll up—Todo School`s Daiki and Sakai.
Word is they're here to call out the "God of the Touge."

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
The touge gods finally appear.
One of them, Toshiya Joshima, stands in the way.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
The touge gods finally appear.
One of them, Toshiya Joshima, stands in the way.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Joshima, a leader of Purple Shadow, famed as “God Arm.”
The god who attacks the touge with one-hand steering now stands in our way.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Joshima, a leader of Purple Shadow, famed as “God Arm.”
The god who attacks the touge with one-hand steering now stands in our way.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
After Joshima, the man with the foot of a god, Hoshino, appears.
The other god bares his fangs.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
After Joshima, the man with the foot of a god, Hoshino, appears.
The other god bares his fangs.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
A senior member of Purple Shadow with the feet of a god,
Hoshino. The other god, known as God Foot,
bares his fangs.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
A senior member of Purple Shadow with the feet of a god,
Hoshino. The other god, known as God Foot,
bares his fangs.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
No sooner had they toppled a touge god than—
A call from Project D`s Ryosuke Takahashi comes in.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
No sooner had they toppled a touge god than—
A call from Project D`s Ryosuke Takahashi comes in.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Ryousuke had me scope Yabitsu.
Kenta says this is Project D`s endgame.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Ryousuke had me scope Yabitsu.
Kenta says this is Project D`s endgame.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Team 246, Kanagawa`s elite—racing legends are
here to challenge.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Team 246, Kanagawa`s elite—racing legends are
here to challenge.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Team 246, one of Kanagawa's Big Three.
Their hill climb ace, Kobayakawa, is challenging us.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Team 246, one of Kanagawa's Big Three.
Their hill climb ace, Kobayakawa, is challenging us.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
With the defeat of Kobayakawa, Team 246`s hill climber,
their leader Tomofumi Omiya rises to the challenge.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
With the defeat of Kobayakawa, Team 246`s hill climber,
their leader Tomofumi Omiya rises to the challenge.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Tomofumi Omiya, Team 246's leader—
bearing hometown pride, takes the line...
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Tomofumi Omiya, Team 246's leader—
bearing hometown pride, takes the line...

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
After scouting, we returned to Mt. Akina after
a long time. There, an unexpected pair waited.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
After scouting, we returned to Mt. Akina after
a long time. There, an unexpected pair waited.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Returning to Mt. Akina after a long time.
There, two Levin drivers appeared.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Returning to Mt. Akina after a long time.
There, two Levin drivers appeared.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Second run—
Wataru`s fired-up training. Behind a complaining Itsuki,
a car looms closer.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Second run—
Wataru`s fired-up training. Behind a complaining Itsuki,
a car looms closer.

LoadingTextID.SourceString:
Wataru's hot-blooded coaching enters the second run.
From behind Itsuki, who`s desperately driving,
a car is closing in.
LoadingTextID.LocalizedString:
Wataru's hot-blooded coaching enters the second run.
From behind Itsuki, who`s desperately driving,
a car is closing in.

NarrationTextID.SourceString:
Kanagawa, mecca of racing where the strong converge.
The next pass, we`ll attack with him.
NarrationTextID.LocalizedString:
Kanagawa, mecca of racing where the strong converge.
The next pass, we`ll attack with him.
